comment: At 14 days, it was quite dry yet low abv so I added maltodextrin and dextrose.
At 14 days, SG was 1.030. Vanilla was noticeable but not strong enough. I plan on adding extract to take prior to kegging.
I'm looking to brew an Oreo Stout and curious what your final results were for this recipe? Anything you'd do different the next time around?
more vanilla, and I would try to balance the grain flavors with that vanilla. Try some dexo
